org.fujion.spinjs

Class SpinJS

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.spinjs.SpinJS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier, IClientTransform

    @Component(tag="spinjs",
           widgetModule="fujion-spinjs",
           widgetClass="SpinJS",
           parentTag="*",
           description="Spin-js component.")
public class SpinJS
extends BaseUIComponent
    Fujion wrapper for jquery.sparkline component.
